name: House Stuffer
description:
What's this? Boxes keep showing up at your door! Drag those bad boys inside and see how much wealth you can accumulate before the inspector condemns your house!

Open up boxes that appear at your door and store the contents in your house to increase your net value! Be careful, some items are fragile and will be worth less when damaged.

The house inspector likes to make regular visits to check in on you and has some hefty expectations. Make sure your house is in order in time for the visit or face the consequences.
